issue.title: [CF 707] Lua errors
issue.body:

    Unit:Name ":"\
end) Duration:Floor:Hide(0)]" (Base;TMW;Unit). TellMeWhen\Lib\LibDogTag-3.0\Compiler.lua:1636: Unknown astType: "boolean"

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Grrr. I thought I had finally figured out a way around this stupid error, but I guess not.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

And the bar mode is broke, It's show nothing now.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Should be fixed in r673


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

You might need a complete restart of WoW for bars to start working again after r672. I added a new file, and so their might be issues with that file not being found.

That is weird, though, because this file is just a config file, and only needs to load in config mode. So I'm not really sure. Try a restart and let me know if that fixes the issue.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Dogtags errors fixed in r673.

Bar mode still not work.

Edited Nov 24, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

I reset my profiles, bar mode is work so well, it is so magic.

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

That bar group is set to only show while in combat. It is working fine for me (testing with hearthstone) after I disabled the Only Show In Combat option for it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

<<reply 1085026>>

Ya, All fixed.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl
